hero.label: PhD dropout. AI builder. @olleai.
hero.headline: Olle Dyberg
hero.subheadline: I left biophysics to build AI tools and teach 1M+ people how to actually use them.
socialproof.label: I build with AI every day and teach what I learn. If I figure something out, I put it online. That's it.
testimonials.label: Working with
about.label: About
about.headline: Physicist → AI engineer
about.p1: I ended up in biophysics kind of by accident. A professor mentioned a project in Switzerland, I said yes, and before I knew it I was at the University of Fribourg working with the most advanced optical trapping setup in the world. Trapping proteins, writing analysis code, the whole thing.
about.p2: Turns out the code was the part I couldn’t stop thinking about.
about.p3: I found AI and it clicked immediately. Building with it, testing every new tool, figuring out what actually works. Claude Code, agents, context engineering. That’s what I do now.
about.p4: I teach what I learn. A million people have watched me do it on TikTok. I consult for companies that want to ship with AI, not just talk about it.
cta.headline: Got a project? Talk to me.
consulting.label: Consulting
consulting.headline: Let's talk before we build.
consulting.subheadline: I want to understand your stack and your team before I recommend anything. Claude Code, agents, context engineering â€” but only what fits.
consulting.strategy.title: Strategy Session
consulting.strategy.description: One hour, one call. We go through your setup, figure out where AI fits, and you leave knowing exactly what to do next. No slides.
consulting.deepdive.title: Deep Dive
consulting.deepdive.description: Four hours across multiple sessions. I review your architecture, walk through your codebase, and we go deep on Claude Code setup, agent design, and context engineering.
consulting.workshop.title: Team Workshop
consulting.workshop.description: Your team, your codebase. I train everyone on Claude Code, CLAUDE.md architecture, MCP integration, and agent workflows until it sticks. Includes documentation and 30 days of async support after.
consulting.advisory.title: Advisory
consulting.advisory.description: Two strategy calls per month, async support between sessions, plus architecture and code reviews. Like having an AI advisor on the team without hiring one.
consulting.process1.title: We talk
consulting.process1.description: Email me. Tell me what you're working on. If it sounds like a fit, we book a strategy session and go from there.
consulting.process2.title: We scope
consulting.process2.description: I recommend the engagement that fits your situation. Sometimes that's one call, sometimes it's ongoing.
consulting.process3.title: We build
consulting.process3.description: You get documentation and async support, not a slide deck. I stick around until it works.
